SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.tui

Class TextualUserInterface

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.tui.TextualUserInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface
public class TextualUserInterface extends Object implements UserInterface
TextualUserInterface allows to present the game's data to the User (and catch the user's input) through the console.

  • Constructor Summary

    Builds a new TextualUserInterface that reads user input from a provided scanner

    • setGameStatus

      public void setGameStatus(GameStatus gameStatus, TurnStatus turnStatus, String playerTurn)
      Allows to provide the current game status data to the TUI. This is mostly used to compose the status message.
      Specified by:
      setGameStatus in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      gameStatus - current GameStatus phase
      turnStatus - current TurnStatus (PLACE/DRAW)
      playerTurn - the nickname of the player that needs to play
